sub_title: Director of Studies at Alliance Française Amsterdam
summary: I'm a language specialist and have a strong experience with both French and English: over 15 years lecturing and teaching French, over 7 years translating English into French. Passionate about my two career paths, I also enjoy learning myself and keep taking on new challenges (Teacher Trainer, Course Coordinator, Exam Writer, Language Testing Advisor, Content Editor, Consultant).

projects:
[{'title': 'Language Testing Advisor for Translators Without Borders', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'description': 'Consultancy: I designed a language test and grading system to enable Translators Without Borders and its partners to test the listening comprehension and spoken ability of potential interpreters.
The test was designed in English with the aim to have it localised and translated in any language relevant to the recruiting NGOs.
The project required the identification of key performance areas (speaking and listening skills), the development of descriptors of "competence" and of a user-friendly grading system. 
A sector-appropriate section testing knowledge of the humanitarian terminology in a given language was also included.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sylvie', 'last_name': 'Pons', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Director of Studies at Alliance Française Amsterdam'}]}]
